OVH uses SSH to secure encrypted data communications between servers.
Each operating system has SSH clients. See the guide on creating SSH keys for more information.
Please note that you can also configure additional SSH keys on your instance to give other people or to access change your key if you lose it.
The default key () is the one installed on your server if it goes into rescue mode.

An error has occurred submitting the password change request.
An error has occurred loading the information.
For more information regarding this new regulation, please read our Appendix related to personal data processing.
Change of general terms of service
The OVH Terms and Conditions are changing!
The changes made are intended to pursue four main objectives:
To adapt to changes in legislation, in particular with regard to consumer law, contract law and the protection of personal data;
Provide answers to your questions and requests;
Define our modus operandi and our organisation in the context of internationalisation of activities;
Introduction of an article that collects all of the provisions applicable to consumers - i.e customers who use our non-professional services, such as the mediation procedure (Article 12);
Obligation to give at least 30 days notice of any modification likely to degrade your service conditions (Article 3.8);
Introduction of a reminder that each customer remains the owner of the content (data, information, etc ...) hosted on our services (article 3.9);
Clarifying the scope of responsibility of each party, especially with respect to third parties, as well as the conditions under which liability may be transferred to OVH (Article 6);
Strengthening OVH's security and data protection commitments, with particular reference to the context of the new Personal Data Protection Regulation (Article 8);
Commitment not to modify, according to the type of service, the location or geographical zone of ​​the datacentre where the contents are hosted (Article 8.2.3);

Commitment not to subcontract, except for the OVH Group, services that involve access to the data stored in our Services without the express consent of the customer and unless otherwise provided in the applicable Special Terms of Service (Article 2);

If you do not want to be subject to the new provisions, you can withdraw from your services from the 20th of July 2017 and within a maximum of 4 months, in accordance with Article L224-33 of the Consumer Code. To send the request, please create a ticket in your OVH customer account, using as the subject, "Withdrawal from My Services" and including date you want the withdrawal to become effective (Immediately or on the date of renewal of the services).
There was an error when confirming the contract.
An error occurred on adding the restriction rule on the IP {0}

Warning: if you add your current IP, please make sure that it is fixed. Otherwise, you will lose your access next time you relaunch your box. To find out if you have a fixed IP, please contact your ISP.

Activate double authentication using an application

Activate double authentication via text message

OVH advises you to activate double authentication to prevent intruders from accessing your account.
OVH will send you a code via text message/or via a specific smartphone application that you will need in order to log in to your Control Panel.
Use double authentication via text message
Do you live in a country where you cannot receive our text messages?

Emergency codes enabling you to access your Control Panel and reconfigure double authentication.
If your phone gets lost or stolen, we recommend storing the single-use emergency codes in a secure place.

Please copy the emergency codes into a secure place to validate them; you will no longer be able to acces them once the validation is complete.

See all your contact change requests as well as their progress status.
You've been solicited to become the contact for various services.
You can accept or deny the request. To this end, get the validation code you received by email and click on the button to accept it or the button to deny it.

You can change the administrator, technical and billing accounts for your services.
To this end, you only need to edit a line by clicking on the button, to modify the contacts and to validate them with the button.
The designated people will receive an email notification containing the acceptance procedure. You will also receive an email with a validation code to confirm your request.

translation.p: For security reasons, you have to confirm this request.
Click on the link in the email which was sent to{0}.
You will then be redirected to your customer account where you can confirm or cancel your request.
translation.strong: Please note: it might be a few minutes before the email is sent

The following domains will be affected if no restriction blocks the process
A change in email address is classified as a change in owner.
A first name change is classified a change in owner.
A surname change is classified as a change in owner.
A company name change is classified as a change in owner.
A change in legal form is classified as a change in owner details.

The actions on this page change the security settings for your account.
In case of loss or theft of your smartphone or computer, store your passwords and your list of single use emergency codes in a secure location. Do not disclose any confidential information.

Optimize secure access to your account by choosing a strong password, and by adding a 2nd authentication method, which will allow you to access to your account using your phone without having to enter your password each time you log in.
Enable this feature to secure your account.
Oops! An error has occurred recovering the accounts associated with two-factor authentication.
Secure your account with two-factor authentication!
Protecting your customer account is absolutely vital, and the security offered by a simple password is not always sufficient.

By enabling two-factor authentication, you will increase your security level: just your password alone will no longer be enough to compromise your account. Your mobile phone would also be required, or your security key.
Your key has been successfully added.
To add other authentication methods, go to the "Security" page on your account.
Authenticate using a security code received by SMS.
